website_summaries.verdict: Choose this building kit if you want wood pieces rather than plastic. Otherwise, check out other TINKERTOYs that work just as well but cost less.
pros: Stands out from other TINKERTOY products because the pieces are made of real wood
Includes 65 basics such as end caps, spools, and rods
Includes an instructional booklet with 9 building suggestions
Comes in the classic cylindrical container
cons: An expensive kit despite the fact it has only 65 pieces
Some parents who remember the toy from their youth say the components aren't as sturdy as they once were

customer_reviews.title: but I was sorely disappointed. The box is under half full of toys ...
customer_reviews.text: Toys broke in half after two times being played with. I had hoped for the older style tinker toys to be more rugged, but I was sorely disappointed. The box is under half full of toys and not very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality.  Pieces Broke within minutes.
customer_reviews.text: We thought these would be such a fun, classic building toy. We got them for our 4 year-old's birthday. Literally within 2 minutes one of the circular connecter pieces snapped in half. After playing with them another 10 minutes, another connector piece broke. They broke when I was trying to connect/disconnect the pieces, so it wasn't like a little toddler treating them inappropriately. It was an adult trying to carefully take things apart and they just snapped. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AMZNshopper

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wanted this wooden building set for her daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this wooden building set for her daughters. The 5 yr. old and the 2 yr. old are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The size of these toys do not match the old brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Fun Hands-on toy.
customer_reviews.text: For my Grandchildren and they love playing with it as I enjoyed playing with Tinkertoys when I was a child.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Sayer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 2-year-old niece because she likes putting things together. They were a hit with her as well as other kids and adults! I bought this "classic" version because the box seemed better for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good traditional tinker toy set. Came on very good comdotion.
customer_reviews.author: catherine dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Building Set
customer_reviews.text: This was given to a great grandson who loves to build things. He is a little young yet but still likes to put things together with it. Quite fun to watch his skills develop with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest King Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Really cool set you can put so much together with these
customer_reviews.text: Son plays with these all the time and hes 8.... Really cool set you can put so much together with these!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Horinek

customer_reviews.title: Lots of building time. Well made and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Had these when i was a kid. Got them for my grandson but i think i played with them as much as him. This size can does limit you to smaller builds but great for a starter.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybear

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas present.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandchildren, they have been a great hit. They love them as much as I did as a child. Another bonus is that when they play with these they use their mind instead of zoning out in front of a screen!
customer_reviews.author: Chris 595

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old has a lot of fun building with this set
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old has a lot of fun building with this set. When you first get the kit, the wood pieces are stiff and are hard to connect to the round joint pieces but they loosen up after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: wonderful to find the older toys still available - bought ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful to find the older toys still available - bought for my soon to be 3 year nephew for Christmas - his parents were thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Douglas E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Pieces are difficult to fit together, but I assume will have some give over time. Otherwise good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Runnin' Mama

customer_reviews.title: Same great product as always.
customer_reviews.text: Almost 5 year old daughter loves them. Just wish there were more pieces. Same solid wood as always.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Broke same day it was open.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as a Christmas gift. The 3 of the stem pieces broke right away. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Okdodd

customer_reviews.title: Timeless toy
customer_reviews.text: Always have fun with this toy. Imagine it and build it.
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson for Christmas. He loves them. I wish the container & lid were a little sturdier, not sure how it will hold up over time. Otherwise, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Terri W.

customer_reviews.title: This toy brings me back to my childhood!! ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy brings me back to my childhood!! It's a pleasure to play this w./ my 7 year old son!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Your better off buying a used
customer_reviews.text: Your better off buying a used. Some of the holes do not work, or are so tight that once you put the pieces together you cannot take some of them apart. Plus the older pieces from the 70's and 80's come with plastic pieces that do not come with this one. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: they love building and compete who an build
customer_reviews.text: Grandson and granddaughter were thrilled and excited to have 1 each .. they love building and compete who an build faster
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wells

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The wood split apart on many of the pieces. My kids got these for Christmas and they didn’t even last a month.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Circular pieces chip easily. Get the set with more pieces.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed with this product. It's difficult to get the parts to connect to each other. And some of the round pieces have broken with very little use.
customer_reviews.author: JP24

customer_reviews.title: The Tinkertoy Building kit is good quality. It just doesn’t hold my four year ...
customer_reviews.text: The Tinkertoy Building kit is good quality. It just doesn’t hold my four year old grandsons attention for very long. The pieces are a little hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Regena Rees

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to put pieces together
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to put the pieces together. My 3.5 year old cannot play with these by himself. I have to build everything for him. I even have a very hard time putting the pieces together. Some pieces broke when finally able to get them together. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: EmMarie

customer_reviews.title: Though it is not the original wooden I grew up ...
customer_reviews.text: Though it is not the original wooden I grew up with, it is still the creative toy every kid should have. I bought it for my niece and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cincy

customer_reviews.title: Newly manufactured version of classic Tinkertoy.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know K'Nex made Tinkertoy buildling kits. These work like the Tinkertoy many adults fondly remember as the construction toy with thin wooden dowels with circular wooden disks. However, these don't work with older Tinkertoy. While the toy has been "a classic since 1913," this set is not compatible with the sticks and disks of olden years. For starting a new set, this works fine and is fun to play with. I think you may have to buy only K'Nex-manufactured Tinkertoy set if you want to increase your stash.
customer_reviews.author: penguingrooves

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful you for your mind!
customer_reviews.text: One of my 3 year old girls has an engineering mind and this is a perfect building toy for her. I remember playing with these when I was young and I loved them. The best thing about these is no screen time. They are all wood and come with the sticks and connectors. You're only limited to what your mind can come up with. My daughter is very occupied with them, so much so I'm thinking of expanding her set. This is a great set but at only 60+ pieces, they get used up quickly!
customer_reviews.author: JLES

customer_reviews.title: Uses imagination- great to see these come back
customer_reviews.text: I was really glad to see Tinkertoys back on the market. I had a lot of fun playing with these as a kid and it was great to be able to see my kids play with these. The pieces fit together well and no pieces have been broken (I have two boys and they are not the "quiet gentle type). If they can survive my boys, they are durable! The pieces in the set are all wood, no plastic parts. My four year old has been able to put pieces together and pull them apart (sometimes with a little help from mom). Of course, I also appreciate that there are no batteries or sounds! Great set, good price, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: A nice building set, that should include more than it does.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the set were bigger, and included more of the longer pieces, but it's sufficient, and there's plenty that I and my 5 year old daughter can do with it. Just plan on taking one thing apart before trying to build another. Anything complex will probably use most of what you've got with this set. Some of the pieces are a bit of a tight fit initially if you're trying to get things fully inserted, but they seem to be getting easier to use with time. I like that it's all wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Walker

customer_reviews.title: Hooray for Tinkertoy!
customer_reviews.text: Ah, but there is much to be said of this classic toy. Or, perhaps not. It's Tinkertoy, a simple set of that old kit in a box just perfect for little hands. The wooden pieces seem to be of good quality, holding up to my daughters' playtime. I love the canister they come in, making clean-up and storage easy. Here is a wonderful, basic set of a classic building toy. It's fun, it works, it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Parrot Toys
customer_reviews.text: I don't have small children, but I do have a 29 year African grey parrot that goes through wooden toys like a buzz saw. Pet store bird toys cost a fortune, so I'm always looking for kids toys that are safe for my grey to play with and chew to splinters. These Tinkertoys fit the bill. They are colorful, non-toxic, and I can arrange them in interesting configurations that my parrot loves! Fun toys for kids, great toys for parrots! Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: Fun without electronics
customer_reviews.text: Delighted to receive this Tinkertoy kit as it reminded me of a fun--filled childhood. It just proved that one doesn't have to have every electronic toy in order to have fun. I never would have thought to buy this toy when shopping but I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: asiana

customer_reviews.title: ... as strong and durable or as big it seems like as the original set but my kids loved them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not as strong and durable or as big it seems like as the original set but my kids loved them none the less. None of them have broken yet and so far only one piece was hard to get together. Other than that it's a great pass time and good for kids to build with learning great skills!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wood shrinks and expands.
customer_reviews.text: Good toy but wooden part is annoying. We used to have a plastic tinkertoys and they last for a long time, kids also could bend them. The wooden part minus flaw-they expand in warm and shrink in cold. So when kids build something it's hard to remove parts and we have to place it in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Bigslacker

customer_reviews.title: Everlasting toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Pieces are a little bigger than the original, but very well made. Should last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Webber

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Good toy. Wood. Teaches spatial relations and all around fun. The thinking man's Lego.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to lie this is a great toy but I really miss the metal lid.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

product_meta.title: Tinkertoy Basic Building Kit
product_meta.description: Bring back memories from your childhood with Tinkertoy basics! This set includes 65 real wood Tinkertoy parts and pieces including rods, spools and end caps. Tinkertoy is great for builders ages 3 and up. Get started creating with the 9 including building ideas, or build anything you can imagine with the included parts and pieces. Once building time is over, use the iconic tube storage container to keep all the pieces together. Most models can be built one at a time. Recommended for builders ages 3+.
feature_bullets: 65 brightly-colored pieces – The Tinkertoy basic set contains 65 parts in vibrant colors. It includes rods, spools, and end caps made of premium wood. Spend time with your little ones with this building set!

Endless building ideas – hone your child's ability to build and create at an early age. Let your builders create primary shape and abstract models out of the wooden pieces, and discover MORE models that you can help your child construct!

Iconic tube packaging – this 65-piece building set comes with an iconic tube-style packaging that allows easy and convenient storage of all the pieces. The tube A classic red embellished with retro graphics for a fun touch.

Full-color instructions – each Tinkertoy basic set comes with a full-color, easy-to-follow instruction booklet that contains 9 building ideas. Introduce your kids to the art of building and creating at an early age with this exciting set!

Wood parts stay together: gone are the days of your favorite Tinkertoy model falling apart.  Tinkertoy sets now include re-engineered wood parts that stay together for long-lasting play.  The bright colored parts are easy to put together, but stay together for great after build playing.

Development benefits: Tinkertoy supports key areas of a child's development growth.  As the stack the different part together and discover how the building system works, they're strengthening hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, problem-solving skills, spatial awareness and exercising their imagination!
Commitment to quality: we test to the strictest quality and safety standards, ensuring that your child has a successful, trouble-free building experience.

Parts : broken part?  Missing part?  If you find yourself in need of a replacement for any reason, just give us a call!  We'll get you what you need so that your child can get back to building as soon as possible.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars62 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
